mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar_events (user_id, title, description, event_date, start_time, end_time, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{user.userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{eventDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT event_id, user_id, title, description, event_date, start_time, end_time, created_at, updated_at FROM calendar_events WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY event_date ASC, start_time ASC

SELECT event_id, user_id, title, description, event_date, start_time, end_time, created_at, updated_at FROM calendar_events WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND event_date = #{eventDate} ORDER BY start_time ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE calendar_events SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, event_date = #{eventDate}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE event_id = #{eventId}
